sentences.english: Emulsion paint is ' green coating , but its property of film forming is poor.
sentences.chinese: 乳膠漆是綠色環保塗料，但它成膜性較差。

sentences.english: Latex and cork blend footbed offers increased cushioning and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 乳膠和軟木混合鞋墊提供更多的緩衝和舒適。

sentences.english: The pores of latex condoms are too small to allow HIV to pass through.
sentences.chinese: 乳膠避孕套上的間隙非常小，艾滋病毒無法穿過它們。

sentences.english: Wear rubber or latex gloves when using.
sentences.chinese: 施工時請使用橡膠或乳膠手套。

sentences.english: Wear a pair of disposable white latex glove in a party.
sentences.chinese: 戴一副白色一次性乳膠手套去參加派對。

sentences.english: Imperfect transmission is the glass or film upon which the emulsion is coated.
sentences.chinese: 塗乳膠的玻璃片或軟片不完全透明。

sentences.english: Natural latex rubber is another option.
sentences.chinese: 天然乳膠是另一中選擇。

sentences.english: Use latex or polyurethane condoms only to protect against HIV.
sentences.chinese: 只有乳膠或聚亞安酯安全套可以預防HIV。

sentences.english: Use of latex condoms or vaginal barriers decreases but does not eliminate risk.
sentences.chinese: 使用乳膠避孕套或子宮帽可降低但不能消除這種危險。

sentences.english: You can even use latex gloves to cover your hands.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以使用乳膠手套護住手。

sentences.english: Gel Lining is latex-free and hypoallergenic.
sentences.chinese: 凝膠襯裏無乳膠和低過敏性。

sentences.english: Use a scrub brush if it looks as though the latex paint isn't coming off of your skin.
sentences.chinese: 用板刷如果它看起來好像乳膠漆不來你的皮膚脫落。

sentences.english: The color sensitive emulsion consists of three layers, each of which is sensitized for a different color.
sentences.chinese: 感色乳膠包括三層，每一層對一種不同的顏色感光。

sentences.english: Latex protein has also been linked with allergies in some people, so use caution.
sentences.chinese: 因爲有人會對乳膠蛋白過敏，所以選擇時候要小心。

sentences.english: High light latex paint, low odor, and dry fast.
sentences.chinese: 高光乳膠漆的氣味低，而且乾燥速度快。

sentences.english: In this article, ion chromatography was used to analyze anion in latex.
sentences.chinese: 採用離子色譜法對乳膠製品中陰離子進行分析。
